attributes.action: include TOMMY STEELE in the New Years Honours and make him SIR TOMMY STEELE. He deserves it and its long long over due
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He's a wonderful performer, singer dancer comedian.Loved by so many of us, so come on Gordon pay homage to one of ENGLANDS greats. PLEASE!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
